[ C ] the part of a planet's atmosphere that is farthest from the planet : What is happening in Mercury's exosphere? An exosphere is the upper part of any planetary atmosphere, where the density of atoms is so low that they don't collide with each other. the exosphere
[ S ] the part of the earth's atmosphere that is farthest from the earth: The temperature at the base of the exosphere is about 1300 K. Atoms of hydrogen, helium, sodium, potassium and calcium have been seen in the exosphere. See also
